extendedInfo.description: Learning alphabets is now fun with A2Z with Animals application. Kids can not only learn alphabets but can also correlate them various animals they see around them. It has been proven that when a learning is assisted with visual material, its much more efficient.  This application intends to take the kids out of non interactive books to an interactive learning experience.A2Z is the second application in "My First Steps" learning series for toddlers by Concoct Services. The animals are displayed in alphabetical order from A2Z and Kids can simply tap on them to listen  their name and the respective letter.A2Z help kids to Shift from Boring learning to an interactive method. Comes with real pictures of animals for kids to correlate them with their name.Featuresâ¢Absolutely free (ad supported). Complete alphabets without any locksâ¢Real Animal Photos with Alphabets to Correlate for Kidsâ¢Application speaks our Alphabets with Animal nameâ¢Quick learning moduleâ¢Very simple and easy to use applicationâ¢Have click and play functionality for easy navigationâ¢Option of AutoPlay. Just leave the kid with application to enjoy and accelerate self learning (Coming Soon)â¢Very easy to use even for a toddler. Just touch the screen to move to next alphabet .Next version with Animal Sounds to make the learning more interactive and faster.  So keep visiting us.In case you like the application, please rate us on high. In case any issue please write us back first before rating us on negative and trust we will respond proactively. Keywords: Animals, ABCD, Toddlers, Kids, Learning, Pre School, My first step,  PreSchool, Alphabets,  Concoct Service, Teaching, baby, , Kindergarten, Phonics, Reading, education, words,  Child, School,  ABC, A2Z, letters
